scripts.build: DATABASE_URL=postgresql://placeholder prisma generate --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json
scripts.package: rm -rf dist/node_modules && mkdir -p dist/node_modules/.prisma && cp -r ../../node_modules/.prisma/client dist/node_modules/.prisma/client && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip . && cd ..
